backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features with file mappings, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for the GigMarket landing website.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, routing, styling, and data structures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light and dark themes, including trust colors (blue and green).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the GigMarket landing website with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with six routes (landing, about, manual, reviews, complaints, download) wrapped in a Layout component with Header and Footer.
frontend/src/components/CTAFooter.tsx: Call-to-action footer section with gradient background, compelling copy, and two CTA buttons linking to download and about pages.
Features showcase section displaying five key platform capabilities (verified workers, location-based hiring, quick hiring, ratings & reviews, multi-category workers) in a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand info, quick links, support links, contact information, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header component with logo, desktop/mobile menus, and links to Home, About, Manual, Reviews, and Download pages. Includes responsive mobile menu toggle with hamburger icon.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Landing page hero section with headline, description, CTA buttons (Download APK, Get Started), and a hero image with decorative gradient elements.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Four-step process section explaining how to use the platform: post job, workers apply, hire instantly, and track status. Displays steps in card grid with icons.
Grid of five navigation cards linking to About, User Manual, Reviews, Complaints, and Download pages. Each card has an icon, title, description, and gradient color scheme.
frontend/src/components/StatsSection.tsx: Statistics showcase section displaying four key metrics: 15,000+ workers, 25,000+ jobs, 4.8/5 rating, and 50+ cities. Features gradient background and icon-based layout.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: User testimonials section displaying four reviews from employers and workers with avatars, ratings, roles, and quoted feedback in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadgesSecti: Trust indicators section showing three badge images (Verified Platform, Secure Payments, Quality Service) with titles in a centered horizontal layout.
frontend/src/components/WorkerCategories: Grid displaying seven worker categories (Factory, School, Construction, Helpers, Drivers, Cleaners, Technicians) with icons, names, and descriptions in hoverable cards.
frontend/src/data/dummyData.ts: Contains mock data arrays for FAQs, user reviews (employers and workers), and complaint tickets with various statuses and responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor using React Query, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining trust-blue and trust-green brand colors and design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
Displays GigMarket's mission, problem statement, target users (workers and employers), and key features in a card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintBoxPage.tsx: Complaint submission form and tracking interface with category selection, status badges, and a list of existing complaints with their resolution states.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadAPKPage.tsx: Page component for downloading the GigMarket Android APK, featuring version info (v2.1.0), download button, app screenshots carousel, installation instructions, and system requirements.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page component that composes multiple sections (Hero, HowItWorks, Features, Stats, WorkerCategories, Navigation, TrustBadges, Testimonials, CTAFooter) into a single scrollable page.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewCentrePage.tsx: Review management page displaying overall ratings, rating distribution chart, filterable review list (by worker/employer), and a form for submitting new reviews with star ratings.
frontend/src/pages/UserManualPage.tsx: Comprehensive user guide page with step-by-step instructions for account creation, job posting, worker application, hiring process, safety tips, and FAQ accordion section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including trust-blue/trust-green brand colors, OKLCH color system, custom shadows, Inter font family, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata file documenting GigMarket as a worker hiring platform with architectural notes on mobile-first design, routing structure, trust-focused UI, and detailed image requirements for icons and illustrations.
